Title: Discover Life Database
Author: Discover Life Research Team
Text Content: The scientific name of this bee is Acamptopoeum argentinum, this is the bee's accepted name. Acamptopoeum argentinum was originally described by Friese in the year 1906. Acamptopoeum argentinum's taxonomic hierarchy is, The kingdom is Animalia ; The phylum is  Arthropoda ; The class is  Insecta ; The order is  Hymenoptera ; The family is  Andrenidae ; The genus is  Acamptopoeum ; and the species is  Acamptopoeum argentinum
